presets.name: INIT - Start
presets.description: Default pattern with a simple melodic phrase

presets.name: INIT - Empty
presets.description: Blank pattern for creating sequences from scratch

presets.name: ACID - Classic 303
presets.description: Authentic TB-303 acid bassline with characteristic slides and rests

presets.name: ACID - Squelchy
presets.description: High-resonance acid pattern with octave jumps and rests

presets.name: ACID - Aggressive
presets.description: Fast-moving aggressive acid line with rapid note changes

presets.name: ACID - Bubbling
presets.description: Bubbly acid pattern with small intervals and many rests

presets.name: BASS - House Groove
presets.description: Classic house music bassline with syncopated rhythm

presets.name: BASS - Techno Pulse
presets.description: Driving techno bassline with repetitive pulse

presets.name: BASS - Funk Groove
presets.description: Syncopated funk bassline with rhythmic punches

presets.name: BASS - Deep Sub
presets.description: Deep sub bass with octave drops for maximum low end

presets.name: BASS - Rolling
presets.description: Smooth rolling bassline with continuous movement

presets.name: LEAD - Trance
presets.description: Uplifting trance lead melody with emotional progression

presets.name: LEAD - Melodic
presets.description: Complex melodic sequence with octave variations

presets.name: LEAD - Euphoric
presets.description: Happy uplifting lead with positive energy

presets.name: LEAD - Stabs
presets.description: Short rhythmic lead stabs for accent and energy

presets.name: ARPEGGIO - Major Triad
presets.description: Classic major chord arpeggio pattern

presets.name: ARPEGGIO - Seventh
presets.description: Extended arpeggio with seventh interval for jazzy feel

presets.name: ARPEGGIO - Octave Jump
presets.description: Arpeggio spanning multiple octaves for wide range

presets.name: ARPEGGIO - Fast Roll
presets.description: Rapid arpeggiated pattern with continuous motion

presets.name: RHYTHM - Syncopated
presets.description: Off-beat rhythmic pattern for groove and movement

presets.name: RHYTHM - Driving
presets.description: Constant driving rhythm with minimal rests

presets.name: RHYTHM - Broken Beat
presets.description: Irregular broken beat pattern for complex rhythm

presets.name: MELODY - Ascending
presets.description: Smooth ascending melodic scale

presets.name: MELODY - Descending
presets.description: Smooth descending melodic scale

presets.name: MELODY - Wave
presets.description: Wavelike melodic motion up and down

presets.name: MINIMAL - Sparse
presets.description: Minimal pattern with very few notes for space

presets.name: MINIMAL - Pulse
presets.description: Minimalist pulse on root note with subtle variation

presets.name: RANDOM - Chaos
presets.description: Seemingly random notes for experimental textures
